sentences.sContent: Yes, it is like a rectangle.
It is actually this rectangle that you drag to another element.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is actually this rectangle that you drag to another element.
sentences.sCn: 实际上是将这个矩形拖放到另一个元素。

trans.tranOther: a shape that has four straight sides, two of which are usually longer than the other two, and four 90˚ angles at the corners
